snippet.title: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2101440/DreamCell_Lost_in_Nightmares/

Blockcode Games has finally launched the trailer for its most recent indie game with rogue like elements, DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares and we are looking forward to seeing you play our game.
It will launch on 25th of November with a small discount so make sure you are there to get your very first copy.
===========================================
What is DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares?

It is an indie action game with rogue-like elements where you are stuck inside your nightmares and have to find your way out of it. But will you make it or you will be dragged into the nightmares and be stuck there forever? Play our very first action indie game with rogue like elements and find out.
===========================================

===========================================
Platforms

At the moment the game is only available for PC, but we will launch it on consoles too ( PlayStation, Switch, etc.). Blockcode Games dreams big and wishes to have its very first game on consoles.
===========================================
Socials

You can stay tuned with our future indie or platformer games on the social:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blockcodegames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlockcodeGames
Discord: https://discord.gg/jaQcX2q3dX
===========================================

Music by: Jamie Kesby

#indiegame #indie #roguelike #indiegames #gaming #newindie
